item.title: 2012 thus far
item.description: Various projects, paintings and illustrations from 2012 so far. A series of paintings of the Belcher's from Bob's Burgers ( 2 more to finish), a painting in collaboration with AOL and Stand Up to Cancer, Finn from Adventure Time and various other doodles.

item.title: The Making Of LWLies On the Road
item.description: Inspired by Jack Kerouac's original manuscript, the LWLies editorial team decided to produce the features section of their On the Road issue on a single piece of scroll. Hand-typed, set and illustrated in one 12-hour burst of creativity, it was a unique collaboration that produced amazing results.
item.content:encoded: Inspired by Jack Kerouac's original manuscript, the LWLies editorial team decided to produce the features section of their On the Road issue on a single piece of scroll. Hand-typed, set and illustrated in one 12-hour burst of creativity, it was a unique collaboration that produced amazing results.

item.title: Oregon College of Art and Craft
item.description: As a principal center for education, creative expression, and the mastery of contemporary craft, the College selected Charles Rose Architects to design three new buildings for its 9.5 acre wooded campus: the campus library, the metals workshop, and the drawing, painting and photography (DPP) studio, which includes a small thesis pavilion.
item.content:encoded: As a principal center for education, creative expression, and the mastery of contemporary craft, the College selected Charles Rose Architects to design three new buildings for its 9.5 acre wooded campus: the campus library, the metals workshop, and the drawing, painting and photography (DPP) studio, which includes a small thesis pavilion.

item.title: linkin park | LIVING THINGS
item.description: Artwork for Linkin Park's 2012 album and single releases. After having worked with Linkin Park's creative team for some time, Ghost Town was given the opportunity to create the album art for their 2012 record LIVING THINGS. In addition to the main album itself, we have also been able to create the covers for their subsequent singles. Credits Include - Artwork & Creative Director
item.content:encoded: Artwork for Linkin Park's 2012 album and single releases. After having worked with Linkin Park's creative team for some time, Ghost Town was given the opportunity to create the album art for their 2012 record LIVING THINGS. In addition to the main album itself, we have also been able to create the covers for their subsequent singles. Credits Include - Artwork & Creative Director

item.title: RoAndCordials
item.description: Every year RoAndCo sends out a Christmas gift to special clients, friends and collaborators. Having recently moved into a new studio space, we wanted to tie in our 2011 Christmas gift with our office warming party. Based on the theme of RoAndCordials, we collaborated with Morris Kitchen who provided us with beautifully bottled and equally delicious Ginger Syrup. We printed the bottle labels in the style of traditional medicine/cordial bottles, including Ginger Syrup cocktail recipes and Happy Holiday messages in the text. In honor of our new White Street office and the festive season, we decided on a White theme for our party - and nestled the bottles on white shredded paper in a white cardboard box. The party invites were letterpressed in the same style as the bottle labels, and placed on top of the bottles. To remind our guests to wear white, we stamped this message onto small white squares of fabric and placed on top of the invite. For a final touch, we printed addressable stickers that wrapped around the box, mimicking the invite and bottle label.
item.content:encoded: Every year RoAndCo sends out a Christmas gift to special clients, friends and collaborators. Having recently moved into a new studio space, we wanted to tie in our 2011 Christmas gift with our office warming party. Based on the theme of RoAndCordials, we collaborated with Morris Kitchen who provided us with beautifully bottled and equally delicious Ginger Syrup. We printed the bottle labels in the style of traditional medicine/cordial bottles, including Ginger Syrup cocktail recipes and Happy Holiday messages in the text. In honor of our new White Street office and the festive season, we decided on a White theme for our party - and nestled the bottles on white shredded paper in a white cardboard box. The party invites were letterpressed in the same style as the bottle labels, and placed on top of the bottles. To remind our guests to wear white, we stamped this message onto small white squares of fabric and placed on top of the invite. For a final touch, we printed addressable stickers that wrapped around the box, mimicking the invite and bottle label.

item.title: yelo spa 02
item.description: there is perhaps no greater honor than to be asked to update a brand you created, well, maybe apart from being asked to spit bucket duty on the beyoncé tour, but that's beside the point. the point is that the good people at YELO SPA had to move from their current location, in the shadow of the hearst building to the much more appropriate neighborhood of such luminary brands as tiffany, louis vuitton, chanel, dior and breitling. which is when we jumped in and offered not only to design the new space, on the 12th floor of the incredible art deco building at 5 east 57th street but to also revive the message and look of the brand. below are our team's effort!
item.content:encoded: there is perhaps no greater honor than to be asked to update a brand you created, well, maybe apart from being asked to spit bucket duty on the beyoncé tour, but that's beside the point. the point is that the good people at YELO SPA had to move from their current location, in the shadow of the hearst building to the much more appropriate neighborhood of such luminary brands as tiffany, louis vuitton, chanel, dior and breitling. which is when we jumped in and offered not only to design the new space, on the 12th floor of the incredible art deco building at 5 east 57th street but to also revive the message and look of the brand. below are our team's effort!

item.title: Afghanistan
item.description: I took all of these photos during my 44 days stay in the beautiful land of Afghanistan. Photos are taken in Kabul, Herat, Mezar-e-Sharif and the US airfield base of Bagram.

item.title: Nissyoku
item.description: In the Japanese culture, the meaning of light is life and light brings forms alive. According to these, I designed the lamp, and its light determines the objects character, existence and meaning. I was inspired by the process of the solar eclipse, as you can find the light-shadow contrast in the nature the clearest way in this phenomenon.
item.content:encoded: In the Japanese culture, the meaning of light is life and light brings forms alive. According to these, I designed the lamp, and its light determines the objects character, existence and meaning. I was inspired by the process of the solar eclipse, as you can find the light-shadow contrast in the nature the clearest way in this phenomenon.

item.title: Micronarrativa
item.description: From an idea by the journalist Andrea Maggiolo. "Micronarratives" is a project of life in 140 characters. People seen in passing. Very short stories. 140 characters, because micronarratives born on Twitter. http://twitter.com/micronarrativa Now these stories have a "face".
item.content:encoded: From an idea by the journalist Andrea Maggiolo. "Micronarratives" is a project of life in 140 characters. People seen in passing. Very short stories. 140 characters, because micronarratives born on Twitter. http://twitter.com/micronarrativa Now these stories have a "face".
